Method Detail

inbounds

public static boolean inbounds(int x,
                               int y)
Global function for determining if a Coordinate or Block location is in the bounds of the grid.

Parameters:
x - int representing x value of Coordinate or Block location
y - int representing y value of Coordinate or Block location
Returns:
True if both values are within the bounds of the Tetris grid,
